Package uk.co.caprica.vlcjinfo

Class MediaInfo

  • java.lang.Object
    • uk.co.caprica.vlcjinfo.MediaInfo
  • public final class MediaInfo
extends Object
    Factory class that creates and parses media information.

    This class opens the file, parses the data in bulk, and closes the file.

    See MediaInfoFile for more fine-grained access.

      • mediaInfo

        public static MediaInfo mediaInfo​(String filename)
        Extract media information for a particular file.
        Parameters:
        filename - name of the file
        Returns:
        media information
        Throws:
        MediaInfoParseException - if a parse error occurs

      • sections

        public Sections sections​(String type)
        Get all of the sections of a particular type.
        Parameters:
        type - section type
        Returns:
        list of sections of the requested type, or null if there are no sections of that type

      • first

        public Section first​(String type)
        Get the first section of a particular type.
        Parameters:
        type - section type
        Returns:
        first section of the requested type, or null if there are no sections of that type

      • dump

        public void dump​(Writer writer)
        Dump out the media information in a readable format.

        This is easier to read than a standard toString().

        This should only be used for debugging purposes.

        Parameters:
        writer - writer to dump the media information to

      • toString

        public String toString()
        Overrides:
